Antony soon left Rome to complete the organization of his army. Mean- time Octavian, the young heir of the dictator, appeared to side with the senate against Antony, enlisting a force of Caesar’s veterans. Two legions (quarta et Martia) brought from Greece by Antony deserted him and joined Octavian.
